doc:
Marianne Leone Cooper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marianne_Leone_Cooper 0 Marianne Leone Cooper (born January 2, 1952) is an American film and television actress, screenwriter and essayist. Her longest-running recurring role was playing Christopher Moltisanti's mother on The Sopranos. Marianne_Leone_Cooper ( born January_2_,_1952 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actress , screenwriter_and_essayist .
